DOC.brief_title: Indoxyl Sulfate Induces Leukocyte-endothelial Interactions Through Up-regulation ICAM-1 Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Over past decade , acute kidney injury ( AKI ) acquire much attention potentially devastate problem clinical medicine . When kidney lose filtering function , lot dangerous metabolite accumulate body , include urea , nitrogenous waste product uremic toxin . Indoxyl sulfate ( IS ) anionic uremic toxin accumulate serum patient uremia . In previous study , investigator successfully induce AKI animal model . IS enhanced intercellular adhesion molecule-1 ( ICAM-1 ) expression IL-1β-treated human umbilical vein endothelial cell ( HUVECs ) may play critical role progression AKI . However , molecular mechanism ICAM-1 expression IS-treated IL-1β-treated HUVECs need elucidate . HUVECs incubate 0.2 1 mM IS 24 h cause cytotoxicity . The IL-1β-induced ICAM-1 expression HUVECs significantly enhance IS pretreatment . Furthermore , regulation adhesion molecule expression involve complex array intracellular signaling pathway include mitogen-activated protein kinase ( MAPKs ) , reactive oxygen specie ( ROS ) transcriptional factor . A good understanding might provide important insight prevention AKI .
